original_text:
Finn’s Golden Tavern
Il gioco e le taverne potrebbero essere rappresentati come una coppia ormai assodata. Fin dai tempi antichi le persone hanno tentato la fortuna con giochi di carte o dadi, arrivando poi ai moderni bar e le slot. Ma se invece, essi fossero trasportati in un mondo fantasy?
Questo accade con Finn’s Golden Tavern della NetEnt, una slot che ci porta in un’ambientazione originale e simpatica, totalmente diversa dalle solite slot. Ma parliamone meglio nella recensione qui di seguito.
Finn’s Golden Tavern – Grafica
Una cosa che spicca maggiormente nella schermata di gioco di Finn’s Golden Tavern è sicuramente la bellezza grafica. Partendo solo dallo sfondo, con illustrazioni molto curate e, soprattutto, ricche di dettagli. Bussole, candele squagliate, dadi da gioco e un non proprio rassicurante coltello piantato nel tavolo ci faranno sentire davvero all’interno di una stramba e losca taverna.
Con tutta questa ricchezza di particolari c’è rischio che la griglia di gioco risulti pacchiana? No, affatto. I simboli sulla griglia si sposano perfettamente con il resto dello sfondo, rendendo ancora più originale la slot. Invece dei classici simboli delle carte, campane e ciliegie, possiamo trovare dei dobloni d’oro di diverso valore (5, 10, 20, 50), bottiglie di vino, boccali di birra e anche un intruglio non ben identificato.
Una piacevole ed allegra musica di flauti accompagnata da qualche bicchiere rotto e il chiacchiericcio degli avventori, fa da sottofondo alla slot.
Finn’s Golden Tavern è sicuramente eccelso graficamente e che riesce a trasportare il giocatore in un mondo completamente originale, dando quel tocco di personalità in più a una slot online. Ed ora, vediamo insieme se il gameplay sarà anch’esso all’altezza!
Finn’s Golden Tavern – Gameplay
Il gameplay di questa slot è sicuramente originale, sebbene si sia già visto in altre slot della NetEnt. Il funzionamento è presto detto: invece della classica griglia di gioco, ci troviamo di fronte a uan schermata che assomiglia più a un gioco in flash.
I simboli, infatti, non arrivano tramite dei rulli, ma in una griglia a spirale che parte da sinistra e si muove verso il centro, mostrando venticinque simboli a ogni giocata. Ogni volta che tre simboli uguali si troveranno affiancati, questi spariranno lasciando il posto a una stella che fungerà da simbolo Wild in grado di sostituire qualsiasi altro simbolo e tutti i simboli si muoveranno lungo la spirale per occupare i posti mancanti.
Scopo principale del gioco? Ottenere abbastanza vincite concatenate così da muovere lo scrigno che appare all’inizio della spirale verso il centro della schermata, ottenendo così 5 giri gratuiti in cui potremo aumentare il moltiplicatore delle vincite.
Slot simili a Finn’s Golden Tavern
È difficile incastrare Finn’s Golden Tavern in un solo genere e non ci sono slot uguali ad essa. Però, si possono trovare slot che hanno elementi in comune come: Clover Tales e Rainbrew sui leprecauni irlandesi, oppure London Hunter e Cloud Quest per slot fantasy e steampunk fino a slot ambientate in taverne come Puddy’s Pub e BierHaus.

raw_translation.response:
Finn's Golden Tavern - A Review for Experienced Gamblers

When it comes to gambling, taverns and games inevitably go hand in hand. From ancient times, people have tried their luck with card games and dice, and later on with modern bars and slots. But what if they were transported into a fantasy world? This is precisely what NetEnt's Finn's Golden Tavern achieves, taking us to a unique and charming setting that is unlike any other slot game. Let's dive deeper into this review.

Graphics of Finn's Golden Tavern

The visual appeal of Finn's Golden Tavern is a standout feature, from the intricacy of the illustrations to the attention to detail. The backdrop itself is richly detailed, with compasses, melted candles, dice, and even a knife embedded in a tabletop that creates an eerie ambiance. Despite the abundance of details, the game screen is by no means overwhelming or excessive. The symbols on the reels are beautifully in line with the background, resulting in an even more unique slot experience. Ditching the standard card symbols and bells, Finn's Golden Tavern has gold doubloons of varying values (5, 10, 20, 50), bottles of wine, beer steins, and an unidentifiable concoction. The jolly music of flutes, complemented by shattering glasses and chatter from patrons, set an enjoyable background for the game.

Gameplay of Finn's Golden Tavern

The game mechanics of Finn's Golden Tavern are original, although it has been seen in other NetEnt slots. Instead of the classic reel layout, a spiral grid appears on the screen that looks more like a flash game than your typical slot game. The symbols don't appear on reels but move from left to center via a spiral. Each round shows 25 symbols, and when three matching symbols are in an adjacent sequence, the symbols vanish, replaced by a star symbol that acts as a wild symbol and replaces any other symbol. All symbols move along the spiral to take up the empty spaces.

The main goal of this game is to get enough consecutive wins to move the chest that appears at the start of the spiral towards the middle of the screen, triggering five free spins in which you can increase the multiplier.

Similar Slots to Finn's Golden Tavern

Finn's Golden Tavern is challenging to pigeonhole into any particular category, and there are no other slots that exactly match it. However, there are slots that share similar elements, such as Clover Tales and Rainbrew for Irish leprechauns, London Hunter and Cloud Quest for steampunk and fantasy slots, and Puddy's Pub and BierHaus for those set in a tavern-like atmosphere.

In conclusion, Finn's Golden Tavern is an exceptional slot game that boasts superb graphics and a unique and entertaining gameplay experience that gamblers of all levels can appreciate.

Starting from the background, with highly detailed illustrations, and, above all, rich in detail. With all this wealth of detail, is there a risk that the game grid will result in being tacky? Not at all. A pleasant and lively flute music accompanied by some broken glasses and chatter of the patrons serves as background music for the slot.

The gameplay of this slot machine is definitely original, although it has already been seen in other NetEnt slots. The operation is simple: instead of the classic game grid, we find ourselves facing a screen that resembles more of a flash game.

Review: Finn’s Golden Tavern

Gambling and taverns have always been a solid combination. Since ancient times, people have tried their luck with card and dice games, leading to modern bars and slot machines. But what if these were transported to a fantasy world?

This is what happens with Finn's Golden Tavern by NetEnt, a slot that takes us to an original and fun environment, completely different from the usual slot machines. But let's talk more about it in the review below.

Finn's Golden Tavern - Graphics

One thing that stands out in the game screen of Finn's Golden Tavern is definitely the graphic beauty. Starting from the background, with highly detailed illustrations, and, above all, rich in detail. Compasses, melted candles, dice, and a rather unsettling knife stuck in the table will make us feel truly inside a strange and shady tavern.

With all this wealth of detail, is there a risk that the game grid will result in being tacky? Not at all. The symbols on the grid perfectly match the rest of the background, making the slot machine even more original. Instead of the classic card symbols, bells, and cherries, we can find different value gold doubloons (5, 10, 20, 50), bottles of wine, beer steins, and even an unidentified concoction.

A pleasant and lively flute music accompanied by some broken glasses and chatter of the patrons serves as background music for the slot.

Finn's Golden Tavern is definitely excellent graphically and manages to transport the player into a completely original world, giving that extra touch of personality to an online slot machine. Now, let's see together if the gameplay will also live up to expectations!

Finn's Golden Tavern - Gameplay

The gameplay of this slot machine is definitely original, although it has already been seen in other NetEnt slots. The operation is simple: instead of the classic game grid, we find ourselves facing a screen that resembles more of a flash game.

The symbols, in fact, do not arrive through reels, but in a spiral grid that starts from the left and moves towards the center, showing twenty-five symbols with each play. Whenever three identical symbols are adjacent, they will disappear, leaving room for a star that will act as a wild symbol capable of replacing any other symbol, and all symbols will move along the spiral to occupy the missing spaces.

The main goal of the game? Obtain enough consecutive wins so as to move the chest that appears at the beginning of the spiral towards the center of the screen, thus obtaining 5 free spins in which we can increase the multiplier of the wins.

Slots similar to Finn's Golden Tavern

It is difficult to fit Finn's Golden Tavern into a single genre, and there are no identical slots to it. However, slots can be found that have elements in common, such as Clover Tales and Rainbrew on Irish leprechauns or London Hunter and Cloud Quest for fantasy and steampunk slots, as well as slots set in taverns such as Puddy's Pub and BierHaus.
